prompt:
Professional corporate presentation slide design. Dark dramatic background with Dubai cityscape silhouette at night through fog. Executive silhouette looking at illuminated highways below. 

Text overlay in elegant white and gold typography:

Large headline at top: 'You Have an AI Mandate. Now You Need a Map.'

Subheadline below: 'By 2027, UAE government operations must be AI-enabled. The mandate is clear. The path forward is still being written.'

Bottom section with three bullet points in clean sans-serif:
• Vendor proposals blur together—hype indistinguishable from capability
• Teams cannot communicate feasibility upward  
• Capital deployed without clear ROI criteria

Footer: 'Executive AI Strategy Intensive | Strategic Clarity for GCC Leaders'

Premium corporate slide design, deep blue and gold color scheme, cinematic mood, professional presentation aesthetic. Clean modern layout with generous whitespace.
